SEARCH
Package com.icx.domain.sql

Annotation Interface Annotations.SqlColumn

Enclosing class:
Annotations
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public static @interface Annotations.SqlColumn
For fields which are associated to columns (not array, Collection or Map fields): (Non default) column name, NOT NULL and UNIQUE constraint, text length, etc. of column associated with field

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    int
    charsize
    Define char size of text column associated to field (default 1024).
    String
    defaultValue
    Currently not supported!
    boolean
    isText
    Define if field is to persist as 'text' field in database, which means a CLOB type is to use instead a simple TEXT type.
    String
    name
    Define name of associated column in persistence table to generate field.
    boolean
    notNull
    Define NOT NULL constraint for column associated to field.
    boolean
    onDeleteCascade
    Defines, that foreign key constraint associated to an object reference field has 'ON DELETE CASCADE' function.
    boolean
    unique
    Define UNIQUE constraint for column associated to field.

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      Define name of associated column in persistence table to generate field.
      Returns:
      non default name of column in SQL table associated with this field of Java domain class
      Default:
      ""

    • unique

      boolean unique
      Define UNIQUE constraint for column associated to field.
      Returns:
      true if database table column values must be unique, false otherwise
      Default:
      false

    • charsize

      int charsize
      Define char size of text column associated to field (default 1024).
      Returns:
      size of character column associated with this field
      Default:
      1024

    • isText

      boolean isText
      Define if field is to persist as 'text' field in database, which means a CLOB type is to use instead a simple TEXT type.
      Returns:
      true if content of (character) column can be treated as SQL text (cannot be used in where clause) - to set TEXT/CLOB data type for column
      Default:
      false

    • notNull

      boolean notNull
      Define NOT NULL constraint for column associated to field.
      Returns:
      true if database table column may contain null values - to define NULL constraint for column
      Default:
      false

    • defaultValue

      String defaultValue
      Currently not supported!
      Returns:
      default value to set for existing records if non-null column is added after creating table or is modified to NOT NULL in a specific version (version control)
      Default:
      ""

    • onDeleteCascade

      boolean onDeleteCascade
      Defines, that foreign key constraint associated to an object reference field has 'ON DELETE CASCADE' function.

      Defining onDeleteCascade() forces immediate deletion of child objects in database if parent object will be deleted.

      Returns:
      true if foreign key constraint has 'ON DELETE CASCADE' feature
      Default:
      false
